fields.request: Manual QA: Confirm auto-upgrade revives inactive services when already current
fields.request_details:
1. Ensure the node repository is already on the latest commit (no upgrade will be applied).
2. Stop the managed service with `sudo systemctl stop $(cat locks/service.lck)` and verify it reports `inactive`.
3. Run `python manage.py shell -c "from core.tasks import check_github_updates; check_github_updates()"` to trigger the auto-upgrade workflow.
4. After the task finishes, run `systemctl status $(cat locks/service.lck)` and confirm it reports `active (running)`.
5. Open System â†’ Upgrade Report and confirm the new entry notes the auto-upgrade detected the inactive service and restarted it via a systemd restart (the log should mention `restarting via systemd restart`).
